articles.author: Ivan
articles.title: Sony Xperia PRO-I brings 1.0-inch sensor and variable f/2.0-4.0 aperture - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: Sony's extravagant "Pro" phone will arrive in early December in select markets in Europe.
articles.content:
Update: Check out our Sony Xperia Pro-I handson review.
Out of the blue, Sony has a new Xperia Pro phone. The Xperia Pro-I (where 'I' stands for 'Imaging') is the first phone outside Japan to delive… [+3063 chars]
